aboutSection.title: Why Our Restaurant?
aboutSection.description: We believe in quality ingredients, amazing flavors, and the best dining experience. Our chefs are passionate about creating memorable meals using only the finest ingredients.

chef.title: Expert Chefs
chef.description: Our chefs bring years of experience to the kitchen, crafting dishes with precision and love.

ingredients.title: Fresh Ingredients
ingredients.description: We use only the freshest ingredients to create dishes that are flavorful and satisfying.

dining.title: Dining Experience
dining.description: Our restaurant offers a cozy and inviting ambiance, perfect for any occasion.

newsSection.title: Latest News
newsSection.description: Discover the exciting updates at our newly renovated restaurant in Lozenets! We've added stunning features to enhance your dining experience, from a refreshing garden space to a modern, cozy ambiance. Check out the latest developments and join us for a unique culinary adventure.

reservation.title: Make a Reservation
reservation.success: Your reservation has been successfully made!
reservation.error: There was an error with your reservation. Please try again.

locations.name: Downtown Diner
locations.description: Experience fine dining in the heart of the city with our signature dishes and exclusive ambiance.

locations.name: Seaside Caf√©
locations.description: Enjoy a relaxing meal with a beautiful view of the ocean, featuring fresh seafood and refreshing drinks.

locations.name: Skyline Rooftop
locations.description: Dine under the stars with a breathtaking skyline view and a curated selection of gourmet dishes.
